title: Kimono Textile
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave, hand-dyed, cut work with needle lace fillings
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 1259 x 38.5 cm (41 ft. 3 11/16 in. x 15 3/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Alexandra and Paul Herzan
description: Narrow length of silk suitable in length for creating a kimono. Crisp silk with some slubs, hand-dyed in medium reddish-brown. Cutwork squares with needle lace fillings sparsely arranged over surface.
